You defeated Saizel?"},{"lineNumber":157053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「殺しちゃおらんがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't kill her though."},{"lineNumber":157054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今思い出してもあのときは大変だった」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even now, remembering it, that was running back and forth in the underground labyrinth searching for a hot spring."},{"lineNumber":157059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様最大級のピンチだった、うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was my greatest crisis, yes."},{"lineNumber":157060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最終的にサイゼルとシックスナインで","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, Saizel and I, the that some kind of human joke or something?"},{"lineNumber":157064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぜ、全部本当なんです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-it's all true..."},{"lineNumber":157065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ、結局あのときサイゼルとは","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, in the end, I parted ways with Saizel without having sex."},{"lineNumber":157066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セックスしないまま別れたんだった」","translatedEnglishLine":"We separated without doing it."},{"lineNumber":157067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くう、今思い出しても惜しいことをした」","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn, even now I regret it."},{"lineNumber":157068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、目標が決まったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, the goal is decided."},{"lineNumber":157069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずはハウゼルをゲーット。","translatedEnglishLine":"First, get Hauser."},{"lineNumber":157070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すっかり俺様にメロメロにした後、","translatedEnglishLine":"Once I have him totally infatuated with me,"},{"lineNumber":157071,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウゼルとサイゼル揃って魔人姉妹丼だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll have both Hauser and Saizel, the demon sisters, together in a bowl!"},{"lineNumber":157072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":157073,"originalJapaneseLine":"　待ってろよ、ハウゼルー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just you wait, Hauser!"},{"lineNumber":157074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむむむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmmmmmm..."},{"lineNumber":157075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハウゼルめ、中々見つからないな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That Hauser, he's pretty hard to find..."},{"lineNumber":157076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼルの戦闘は目立つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauser's fighting style is flashy."},{"lineNumber":157077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに見つかると思ったのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought I'd spot him right away..."},{"lineNumber":157078,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき、轟音と共に天を目指すような","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, with a roar, a fierce flame soared toward the sky."},{"lineNumber":157079,"originalJapaneseLine":"猛々しい炎が上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"A fierce pillar of fire rose upwards."},{"lineNumber":157080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだあの火柱……」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What is that pillar of flame...?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い付き合いだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've known each other for a long time, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ってるのは見たことないんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen him angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「基本的にどんなことをされても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, no matter what is done to him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒るような奴じゃないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's not the kind of guy who gets angry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に怒ることがあるのか疑問だが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I doubt he ever truly gets angry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは……んー、押しに弱い、とか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also... hmm, he's weak to pressure, or something like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほう、押しに弱い、ね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh ho, weak to pressure, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふ、これは会うのが楽しみだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, this makes me look forward to meeting him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変なことを考えているなら怒るぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're thinking something weird, I'll get mad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、なんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, what's this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫉妬してるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you jealous?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「安心しろ、お前もちゃんと可愛がってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't worry, I'll take good care of you too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この馬鹿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはハウゼルの友人として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is angry as Hauser's friend,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ってるんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's why she's mad!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、ふん、そんなことばっか言ってると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, if you keep saying things like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイゼルに氷漬けにされるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel will freeze you solid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイゼル？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルの姉だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's Hauser's sister.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちは氷を操る魔人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a demon who controls ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルと敵対してケイブリス派で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She opposes Hauser and belongs to the Cavebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ達と戦っていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fought against Satera and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姉妹で両陣営に別れてたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So the sisters ended up on opposing sides.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人自体はハウゼル大好きなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, she loves Hauser dearly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素直になれなくて喧嘩してるだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's just too proud to admit it and they end up fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、サイゼル、サイゼル……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Saizel, Saizel... that name sounds familiar...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き覚えがあるような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I've heard it before...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、以前俺様が倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, isn't that the demon I defeated before?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ちゃんではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That demon girl?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ゼスの地下迷宮で会った方ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the one we met in the Zeth's underground labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？　サイゼルを倒したのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? You defeated Saizel?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「殺しちゃおらんがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't kill her though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今思い出してもあのときは大変だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, remembering it, that was tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイゼルの使徒が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel's followers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のハイパー兵器を凍らせやがって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: froze my hyper-weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「温泉を探して地下迷宮を右往左往。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was running back and forth in the underground labyrinth searching for a hot spring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様最大級のピンチだった、うむ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was my greatest crisis, yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最終的にサイゼルとシックスナインで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, Saizel and I, the sixty-nine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いの性器をぺろぺろしてやったがな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: licked each other's genitals!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……人間流の冗談か何かか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Is that some kind of human joke or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜ、全部本当なんです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it's all true...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、結局あのときサイゼルとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, in the end, I parted ways with Saizel without having sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスしないまま別れたんだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We separated without doing it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くう、今思い出しても惜しいことをした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, even now I regret it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、目標が決まったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, the goal is decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずはハウゼルをゲーット。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, get Hauser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかり俺様にメロメロにした後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once I have him totally infatuated with me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルとサイゼル揃って魔人姉妹丼だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have both Hauser and Saizel, the demon sisters, together in a bowl!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ってろよ、ハウゼルー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just you wait, Hauser!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむむむ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmmmmmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルめ、中々見つからないな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Hauser, he's pretty hard to find...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルの戦闘は目立つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauser's fighting style is flashy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに見つかると思ったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I'd spot him right away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、轟音と共に天を目指すような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, with a roar, a fierce flame soared toward the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 猛々しい炎が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fierce pillar of fire rose upwards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだあの火柱……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What is that pillar of flame...?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い付き合いだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've known each other for a long time, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ってるのは見たことないんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen him angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「基本的にどんなことをされても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, no matter what is done to him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒るような奴じゃないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's not the kind of guy who gets angry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に怒ることがあるのか疑問だが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I doubt he ever truly gets angry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あとは……んー、押しに弱い、とか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also... hmm, he's weak to pressure, or something like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほう、押しに弱い、ね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh ho, weak to pressure, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふ、これは会うのが楽しみだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, this makes me look forward to meeting him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変なことを考えているなら怒るぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're thinking something weird, I'll get mad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、なんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, what's this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫉妬してるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you jealous?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「安心しろ、お前もちゃんと可愛がってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't worry, I'll take good care of you too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この馬鹿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはハウゼルの友人として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is angry as Hauser's friend,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒ってるんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's why she's mad!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、ふん、そんなことばっか言ってると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, if you keep saying things like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイゼルに氷漬けにされるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel will freeze you solid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイゼル？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルの姉だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's Hauser's sister.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちは氷を操る魔人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a demon who controls ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルと敵対してケイブリス派で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She opposes Hauser and belongs to the Cavebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ達と戦っていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fought against Satera and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姉妹で両陣営に別れてたのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So the sisters ended up on opposing sides.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人自体はハウゼル大好きなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, she loves Hauser dearly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素直になれなくて喧嘩してるだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's just too proud to admit it and they end up fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、サイゼル、サイゼル……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Saizel, Saizel... that name sounds familiar...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き覚えがあるような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I've heard it before...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、以前俺様が倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, isn't that the demon I defeated before?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ちゃんではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That demon girl?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ゼスの地下迷宮で会った方ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the one we met in the Zeth's underground labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに？　サイゼルを倒したのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? You defeated Saizel?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「殺しちゃおらんがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't kill her though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今思い出してもあのときは大変だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even now, remembering it, that was tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイゼルの使徒が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saizel's followers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のハイパー兵器を凍らせやがって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: froze my hyper-weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「温泉を探して地下迷宮を右往左往。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was running back and forth in the underground labyrinth searching for a hot spring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様最大級のピンチだった、うむ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was my greatest crisis, yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最終的にサイゼルとシックスナインで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, Saizel and I, the sixty-nine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いの性器をぺろぺろしてやったがな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: licked each other's genitals!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははははははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……人間流の冗談か何かか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Is that some kind of human joke or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜ、全部本当なんです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it's all true...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、結局あのときサイゼルとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, in the end, I parted ways with Saizel without having sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セックスしないまま別れたんだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We separated without doing it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くう、今思い出しても惜しいことをした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, even now I regret it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、目標が決まったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, the goal is decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずはハウゼルをゲーット。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, get Hauser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかり俺様にメロメロにした後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once I have him totally infatuated with me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルとサイゼル揃って魔人姉妹丼だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have both Hauser and Saizel, the demon sisters, together in a bowl!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ってろよ、ハウゼルー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just you wait, Hauser!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむむむ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmmmmmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルめ、中々見つからないな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Hauser, he's pretty hard to find...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼルの戦闘は目立つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauser's fighting style is flashy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに見つかると思ったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I'd spot him right away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、轟音と共に天を目指すような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, with a roar, a fierce flame soared toward the sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 猛々しい炎が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fierce pillar of fire rose upwards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだあの火柱……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What is that pillar of flame...?
